other_tests.findings: Markedly dilated small bowel loops with air-fluid levels, 2 new transition points in the right mid abdomen and mid abdomen, marked thickening of the distal ileal wall possibly due to inflammatory changes. Presence of a perforated appendix with an extraluminal appendix. Pelvic rim enhancing collections, larger one in the left hemipelvis and a smaller in the right hemipelvis.

other_tests.procedure_name: Drainage of Peritoneal Cavity with Drainage Device, Percutaneous Approach
other_tests.findings: Pelvic abscess noted, with drainage required.
